name: BurritoBox
short_description: As with everything else in this world, there are limits to our need for instant But, apparently, not everyone shares our first impression of Burrito Box, the "first ever burrito kiosk." In fact, this first burrito-dispensing machine was just launched at a gas station in West Hollywood, but, as its website states, there are already plans to position additional outposts throughout the city. That said, we should mention the part about it being 100% natural and free of hormones or antibiotics, which we've Burrito Box LA seems pretty nice and How does the Burrito Box work?.
